title: Prediction: Palantir Stock Could Hit $100 By Year-End (but There's a Catch)
author: Adam Spatacco
description: Palantir Technologies (PLTR) has seen its stock price surge by 380% so far in 2024, making it the best-performing stock in the S&P 500. While the company has made significant progress, including partnerships with tech giants and inclusion in major indexes, the valuation metrics suggest the stock may be overvalued. The author believes Palantir could reach $100 per share by the end of the year, but cautions that it may be more of a momentum investment fueled by day traders rather than a sound long-term investment.
